security: Request to include COMMO training for Marta (Valdes) Iernandez Sinele, D/O Marta Lucas and Julia. No Mexi traces.
summary: A cable requests priority communication training for Marta (Valdes) Iernandez Sinele, daughter of Marta Lucas and Julia, who is scheduled to return to Cuba from Mexico on December 20 after completing a study program under the World Health Organization.
summary_one_paragraph: This secret cable, dated December 9, 1963, from Mexico City, requests priority communication (COMNO) training for Marta (Valdes) Iernandez Sinele, daughter of Marta Lucas and Julia, born on July 22, 1929, and residing at Hazch Number 163 in Havana. (CVALDES) is employed as a statistician at the Ministry of Health and Welfare in Havana and is scheduled to return to Cuba around December 20 from Mexico, where she recently completed a lengthy studies program under the auspices of the World Health Organization. The cable indicates that there are no Mexican traces or independent traces.
title: Request for Communication Training for Marta (Valdes) Iernandez Sinele
